subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: After flying overnight from San Diego, a sleep-deprived Phil Mickelson shot a three-under 67 in the first round. Play was suspended with Luke Donald, through 13 holes, in the lead at four under.
snippet: After flying overnight from San Diego, a sleep-deprived Phil Mickelson shot a three-under 67 in the first round. Play was suspended with Luke Donald, through 13 holes, in the lead at four under.
